Type.SourceCode:
class VDOM_formtext(VDOM_object):
def render(self, parent, contents=""): display = u"display: none;" if self.visible == "0" else u""
if self.mode == "1": mode = u"""readonly="readonly" """ elif self.mode == "2": mode = u"""disabled="disabled" """ else: mode = u""
auto = u"off" if self.autocomplete == "0" else u"on"
clean_id = (self.id).replace('-', '_') id = u"o_%s" % clean_id
# for doctype xhtml 1.0 - width|height depends on padding fixw = int(self.width) - 10 fixh = int(self.height) - 4
border = u"border-width: 0px;" if self.multiline == "0" and self.border == "0" else u""
style = u"""z-index: {zind}; position: {pos}; top: {top}px; left: {left}px; width: {width}px; height: {height}px; padding: 2px 5px 2px 5px; {display} {border} font: 14px tahoma """.format(zind = self.zindex, pos = self.position, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = fixw, height = fixh, display = display, border = border)
if self.multiline == "0": result = u"""<input id="{id}" name="{name}" style="{style}" type="text" tabindex="{tabind}" value="{value}" class="{classn}" autocomplete="{auto}" {mode} /> """.format(id = id, name = self.name, style = style, tabind = self.tabindex, value = self.value, classn = self.classname, auto = auto, mode = mode) else: result = u"""<textarea id="{id}" name="{name}" tabindex="{tabind}" style="{style}" class="{classn}" {mode}>{value}</textarea> """.format(id = id, name = self.name, tabind = self.tabindex, style = style, classn = self.classname, mode = mode, value = self.value)
return VDOM_object.render(self, parent, contents=result)
def wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=""): text_size = self.width if self.value else 0
result = u"""<container id="{id}" visible="{vis}" zindex="{zind}" hierarchy="{hierarchy}" order="{order}" top="{top}" left="{left}" width="{width}" height="{height}"> <svg> <rect x="0" y="0" width="{rec_wid}" height="{rec_hei}" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#000000"/> </svg> <text top="4" width="{txt_wid}" color="#000000">{value}</text> </container> """.format(id = self.id, vis = self.visible, zind = self.zindex, hierarchy = self.hierarchy, order = self.order, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = self.width, height = self.height, rec_wid = int(self.width) - 1, rec_hei = int(self.height) - 1, txt_wid = text_size, value = self.value)
return VDOM_object.wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=result)
